title.rendered: Vadivelu Coming Back as ‘Naai Sekar’ | Amazon Prime | NetFlix | ZEE 5 OTT

content.rendered:
After To many year of Gap, Now The Madurai Comedy King Vaigai Puyal Vadivelu is Coming Back With List of New Tamil Movies. Vadivelu last seen in Mersal Movie 2017. after a gap of about four years, Vadivelu is returning to acting as the lead hero in a tamil film called – Naai Sekar. 

Suraj is Going to Direct “Naai Sekar” and the News has been Confirmed by Reliable Sources. Vadivelu’s character in the Film is ” Naai Sekar” . this is the 4th movie between suraj & Vadivelu. 

The Movie Team is Planning to Make the Shoot Very Fast , and Planning to Release the Movie Before 2022 ( Pongal Festival ).

One More Happy News is Director

Thirumurugan Next Project also Confirmed with RJ Balaji and Vadivelu. Vadivelu has already joined with thirumurugan in “entan magan Movie”
Now this is the Second Movie of Thirumurugan & Vadivelu Combo. as Entan Magan Gived best Out Put of Vadivelu through Out movie . This New Movie also have Very High Expection in Cine Field . 
Upcoming Suriya & Pandiyaraj Combo Movie also Confirm , Vadivelu as Leading Role in that Movie .
One Untitled Simbu Movie also Booked Vadivelu for 2022.  Now is the Time For Vadivelu Big Come back with Back to Back Movies in Tamil Cinema. also he is now busy with OTT projects with Amazon Prime , NetFlix , Zee5 . Let’s Wait for the Treat From Comedy King Vadivelu.

excerpt.rendered: After To many year of Gap, Now The Madurai Comedy King Vaigai Puyal Vadivelu is Coming Back With List of New Tamil Movies. Vadivelu last seen
